item.title: [Training] DBMS with Oracle Day 4
item.author: Debakar Roy
item.description: If you are reading this then I want to notify you that this is the 3rd part of the series of blog post I am writing up about basically DBMS with Oracle. If you haven’t yet read my previous post then feel free to go to this link for part 1 and this link for part 2. Now today we are going to look at something called PL/SQL and also we will do some exercise to get a grip of PL/SQL.
